course_title: Case Studies in Public Mental Health
course_description: This course is the core course for the Certificate in Mental Health. Offered each spring, any current first year student enrolled in the MPH or MSPH program at RSPH that plans to pursue the Certificate in Mental Health must enroll in BSHE 592/HPM 592. Participating certificate students will be identified based on their enrollment in this course.
sections: Class Nbr: 4549, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Druss/Pearsall, Status: Open
